body_html:
@snowluliang I think I have both Cuda 8.0 and cudNN 5.1

C:\Program Files\NVIDIA Corporation\NVSMI>nvcc -V
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2016 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Mon_Jan__9_17:32:33_CST_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.60

My GPU is different from yours

C:\Program Files\NVIDIA Corporation\NVSMI>nvidia-smi.exe
Mon Apr 10 18:37:06 2017
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 376.51                 Driver Version: 376.51                    |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name            TCC/WDDM | Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  Quadro M2000M      WDDM  | 0000:01:00.0     Off |                  N/A |
| N/A   39C    P8    N/A /  N/A |     99MiB /  4096MiB |      0%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

Whenever I try to run tf.Session() I get the error:

It would be of great help if anyone can point out what I am missing out.

body:
@snowluliang  I think I have both Cuda 8.0 and cudNN 5.1
```
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA Corporation\NVSMI>nvcc -V
nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2016 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Mon_Jan__9_17:32:33_CST_2017
Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.60
```

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/24497120/24913815/f8b25d6e-1eef-11e7-98e6-28d14415102e.png)

My GPU is different from yours
```
C:\Program Files\NVIDIA Corporation\NVSMI>nvidia-smi.exe
Mon Apr 10 18:37:06 2017
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 376.51                 Driver Version: 376.51                    |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU  Name            TCC/WDDM | Bus-Id        Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan  Temp  Perf  Pwr:Usage/Cap|         Memory-Usage | GPU-Util  Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  Quadro M2000M      WDDM  | 0000:01:00.0     Off |                  N/A |
| N/A   39C    P8    N/A /  N/A |     99MiB /  4096MiB |      0%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

```
Whenever I try to run ```tf.Session()``` I get the error:

![cuda_error](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/24497120/24913967/6b9e08c8-1ef0-11e7-9ad1-4d215f49de03.png)

It would be of great help if anyone can point out what I am missing out.
